parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.50

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global
</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Inventory

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Unassigns existing item and tries to put it into inventory. If there is no space in inventory the item simply disappears.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> unit '''unassignItem''' item

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> item: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_bluforUnit [[unassignItem]] "NVGoggles";
_bluforUnit [[removeItem]] "NVGoggles";
_opforUnit [[unassignItem]] "NVGoggles_OPFOR";
_opforUnit [[removeItem]] "NVGoggles_OPFOR";
_independentUnit [[unassignItem]] "NVGoggles_INDEP";
_independentUnit [[removeItem]] "NVGoggles_INDEP";</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>{
   _x [[unassignItem]] [[hmd]] [[Magic Variables#x|_x]]; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>Unassign (not remove) NVGs from all units. The class name of the NVG is not needed</value></part></template>
} [[forEach]] [[allUnits]];</code>


</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[assignItem]], [[addItem]], [[removeItem]], [[linkItem]], [[unlinkItem]], [[assignedItems]], [[removeAllAssignedItems]]
</value></part></template>
